GV06vargs_u:10: paratantrotpattir dakṣiṇāgnāv āhitāgniḥ kurvīta śālāgnāv anāhitāgniḥ // VGrs_1.6
GV06vargs_u:11: gomayena gocarmamātraṃ caturasraṃ sthaṇḍilam upalipyeṣumātraṃ tasmin lakṣaṇaṃ kurvīta satyasadasīti paścārdhād udīcīṃ lekhāṃ likhati /
GV06vargs_u:20: parisamuhya paristīrya paryukṣya tūṣṇīm idhmābarhiḥ saṃnahya grāgagrair dakṣiṇārambhair udaksaṃsthairayugmair dhātubhiḥ stṛṇāti // VGrs_1.9
GV06vargs_u:23: samāv apracchinnaprāntau darbhau prādeśamātrau pavitre stho vaiṣṇavye ityoṣadhyā
GV06vargs_u:24: chittvā viṣṇormanasā pūte stha ity adbhis trir unmṛjya prokṣaṇīr dharmaiḥ saṃskṛtya
GV06vargs_u:25: praṇītāṃ praṇīya nirvapaṇaprokṣaṇasaṃvapanam iti yathādevataṃ carum adhiśritya sruksruvaṃ
GV06vargs_u:26: pramṛjyābhyukṣyāgnau pratāpyāditir asi nācchinnapattrety ājyam agnāv adhiśrayati // VGrs_1.12
GV06vargs_u:28: pari vājapatir ityājyahaviś ca triḥ paryagnikaroti // VGrs_1.14
GV06vargs_u:29: devas tvā savitotpunātv ityājyaṃ śrapayati // VGrs_1.15
GV06vargs_u:30: tūṣṇīm idhmābarhir viprokṣya yathā mnātam abhiparistṛṇāti // VGrs_1.16
GV06vargs_u:35: brahmāṇam āmantrya samidham ādhāyāghārāv āghāryājyabhāgau hutvā yunajmi tveti ca yojayitvā // VGrs_1.21
GV06vargs_u:36: nahy ayukto havyaṃ vahata iti ha vijñāyate // VGrs_1.22
GV06vargs_u:38: yukto vaha jātavedaḥ purastādidaṃ viddhi kriyamāṇaṃ yatheha /
GV06vargs_u:39: tvaṃ bhiṣagbheṣajasyāsi goptā tvayā prasūtā gāmaśvaṃ pūruṣaṃ sanema /
GV06vargs_u:42: viśvā agne tvayā vayaṃ dhārā udanyā iva /
GV06vargs_u:47: abhighārya yaddevataṃ haviḥ syāttac ca juhuyād yathādevataṃ yathādevatayā carcā // VGrs_1.26
GV06vargs_u:51: iḍām agna iti sviṣṭakṛtam uttarārdhapūrvārdhe juhuyāt // VGrs_1.28
GV06vargs_u:61: imaṃ stanaṃ madhumantaṃ dhayāpāṃ prapīnamagne salilasya madhye /
GV06vargs_u:62: utsaṃ juṣasva madhumantam ūrmiṃ samudryaṃ sadanam āviśasva /
GV06vargs_u:76: prāṅmukham udaṅmukhaṃ vā sūtikālayaṃ kalpayitvā dhruvaṃ prapadye śubhaṃ prapadya āśāṃ prapadya iti kāle prapādayet // VGrs_2.1
GV06vargs_u:77: reto mūtramiti cyāvanībhyāṃ dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣim abhimṛśet /
GV06vargs_u:79: putraṃ jātam anvakṣaṃ snātaṃ na mātopahanyād ā mantraprayogāt // VGrs_2.3
GV06vargs_u:80: agner abhyāhitasya parisamūḍhasya paristīrṇasya paścād ahate vāsasi kumāraṃ prākśirasam
GV06vargs_u:81: uttānaṃ saṃveśya palāśasya madhyamaṃ parṇaṃ praveṣṭya tenāsya karṇāv ājapet bhūs
GV06vargs_u:85: bhūr bhuvaḥ svas tvayi dadhānīti savye // VGrs_2.4
GV06vargs_u:87: aśmā bhava paraśur bhava hiraṇyam astṛtaṃ bhava /
GV06vargs_u:89: ātmā vai putranāmāsi sa jīva śaradaḥ śatam /
GV06vargs_u:91: yatra śete tadabhimṛśet veda te bhūmi hṛdayaṃ divi candramasi śritam /
GV06vargs_u:92: vedāmṛtasya devā māhaṃ putryam aghaṃ rudam /
GV06vargs_u:94: ājyaṃ saṃskṛtya brahmāṇam āmantrya samidham ādhāyāghārāv āghāryājyabhāgau hutvā vyāhṛtibhiś catasra ājyāhutīr juhuyāt /
GV06vargs_u:96: kāṃsye camase vāhūtisampātān avanīya tasmin suvarṇaṃ saṃnighṛṣya vyāhṛtibhiḥ kumāraṃ catuḥ prāśayet /
GV06vargs_u:97: atyantam eke suvarṇaprāśanam udake nighṛṣyā dvādaśavarṣatāyāḥ // VGrs_2.8
GV06vargs_u:101: sviṣṭakṛte hutvā prāyaścittāhutīśca samidhamādhāya paryukṣati // VGrs_2.10
GV06vargs_u:107: sūtikālayaṃ yathākālaṃ samantād udakena pariṣiñcet // VGrs_2.13
GV06vargs_u:109: evam eva daśamyāṃ kṛtvā pitā mātā ca putrasya nāma dadhyatām ghoṣavadādyantarantasthaṃ
GV06vargs_u:110: dīrghābhiniṣṭānāntaṃ kṛtaṃ na taddhitaṃ dvyakṣaraṃ caturakṣaraṃ vā tyaktvā pitur
GV06vargs_u:113: nāmaiva kanyāyāḥ akāravyavadhānam ākārāntam ayugmākṣaraṃ nadīnakṣatracandrasūryapūṣadevadattarakṣitāvarjam // VGrs_3.3
GV06vargs_u:114: navanītena pāṇī pralipya somasya tvā dyumnenety enamabhimṛśet // VGrs_3.4
GV06vargs_u:115: sarveṣu kumārakarmasv āgneyaḥ sthālīpākaḥ prājāpatyo vā // VGrs_3.5
GV06vargs_u:117: saṃvatsaraṃ mātāpitarau na māṃsam aśnīyātām // VGrs_3.7
GV06vargs_u:118: putrasya jātadante yajetāgniṃ gavā paśunā vā // VGrs_3.8
GV06vargs_u:119: viproṣitaḥ pratyetya putrasya mūrdhānaṃ trir ājighret paśūnāṃ tvā hiṃkāreṇābhijighrāmīti // VGrs_3.9
GV06vargs_u:120: jātakarmavaddhastāṅguliṃ praveṣṭya tenāsya karṇāv ājapet // VGrs_3.10
GV06vargs_u:122: agnidhanvantarī putravratī chāgameṣābhyām iṣṭvā dīrghāṇāṃ vyāhṛtibhiḥ kumāraṃ catuḥ prāśayet /
GV06vargs_u:124: kumārakarmāṇi śukla udagayane puṇye nakṣatre navamīvarjam /
GV06vargs_u:125: sarva ṛtavo vivāhe 'māghacaitrau māsau parihāpyottaraṃ ca naidāgham // VGrs_3.13
GV06vargs_u:130: agnim upasamādhāya parisamuhya paristīrya paryukṣya dakṣiṇato 'gner brahmāṇam upaveśyottarata udapātraṃ śamīśamakavat // VGrs_4.2
GV06vargs_u:131: athainam abhimantrayate hiraṇyavarṇāḥ śucaya iti catasṛbhiḥ /
GV06vargs_u:133: śaṃ no devīr abhiṣṭaya āpo bhavantu pītaye /
GV06vargs_u:135: priyāḥ śaṃ na āpo dhanvanyāḥ śaṃ naḥ santu nūpyāḥ /
GV06vargs_u:136: śaṃ naḥ samudryā āpaḥ śam u naḥ santu kūpyāḥ /
GV06vargs_u:137: śaṃ no mitraḥ śaṃ varuṇaḥ śaṃ no bhavatv aryamā /
GV06vargs_u:138: śaṃ na indraś cāgniś ca śaṃ no viṣṇur urukramaḥ /
GV06vargs_u:140: tāsām udakārthān kurvīta paryukṣaṇe 'bhyundane snāpane ca // VGrs_4.3
GV06vargs_u:141: ājyaṃ saṃskṛtya brahmāṇam āmantrya samidham ādhāyāghārāv āghāryājyabhāgau hutvā agnā āyūṃṣi pavasa iti saptabhiḥ sapta hutvā // VGrs_4.4
GV06vargs_u:143: ye keśinaḥ prathame sattram āsata yebhir āvṛtaṃ yadidaṃ virājati /
GV06vargs_u:149: uṣṇena vāya udakenedhīti taptā itarābhiḥ saṃsṛjya ārdradānava stha jīvadān avasthondatīriṣamāvadety apo 'bhimantrya dakṣiṇaṃ keśāntam abhyundyāt
GV06vargs_u:153: dakṣiṇasmin keśānte darbham ūrdhvāgraṃ nidadhāti // VGrs_4.9
GV06vargs_u:155: svadhite mainaṃ hiṃsīr iti kṣureṇābhinidadhāti // VGrs_4.11
GV06vargs_u:156: yenāvapatsavitā kṣureṇa somasya rājño varuṇasya vidvān /
GV06vargs_u:157: tena brahmāṇo vapatedam asyāyuṣmān ayaṃ jaradaṣṭir yathāsat /
GV06vargs_u:160: dakṣiṇato mātānyā vāvidhavānaḍuhena gomayenābhūmigatān keśān parigṛhṇīyāt // VGrs_4.13
GV06vargs_u:161: mā te keśān anugād varca etattathā dhātā dadhātu te /
GV06vargs_u:162: tubhyamindro varuṇo bṛhaspatiḥ savitā varca ādadhuḥ /
GV06vargs_u:164: tena dharmeṇa punar apo 'bhimantryāparaṃ keśāntam abhyundyād uttaraṃ ca // VGrs_4.15
GV06vargs_u:165: anyau tu pravapanau yena pūṣā bṛhaspater agner indrasya cāyuṣe 'vapat /
GV06vargs_u:168: yena bhūyaś caratyayaṃ jyok ca paśyasi sūryam /
GV06vargs_u:169: tena te vapāmy āyuṣe dīrghāyutvāya suślokyāya suvarcase /
GV06vargs_u:171: yat kṣureṇa parcayatā supeśasā vaptar vapasi keśān /
GV06vargs_u:173: iti lohāyasaṃ kṣuraṃ keśavāpāya prayacchati // VGrs_4.17
GV06vargs_u:174: yathārthaṃ keśayatnān kurvanti dakṣiṇataḥ kapardā vasiṣṭhānām ubhayato 'tribhārgavakāśyapānāṃ pañcacūḍā āṅgirasaḥ śikhino 'nye // VGrs_4.18
GV06vargs_u:176: tryāyuṣaṃ kaśyapasya jamadagnes tryāyuṣam agastyasya tryāyuṣam /
GV06vargs_u:177: yad devānāṃ tryāyuṣaṃ tan me astu śatāyuṣam /
GV06vargs_u:179: parigṛhya gomayena keśān uttarapūrvasyāṃ gṛhasya mūṣyām antarā gehāt paladaṃ ca nidadhyāt /
GV06vargs_u:181: uptvāya keśāntān varuṇāya rājño bṛhaspatiḥ savitā viṣṇurindraḥ /
GV06vargs_u:182: tebhyo nidhānaṃ mahad anvavindann antarā dyāvāpṛthivī apa svaḥ // VGrs_4.21
GV06vargs_u:185: pakṣmaguṇaṃ tilapiśitaṃ ca keśavāpāya prayacchati // VGrs_4.23
GV06vargs_u:195: tato garbhaikādaśeṣu kṣatriyaṃ garbhadvādaśeṣu vaiśyam // VGrs_5.2
GV06vargs_u:196: prākṣoḍaśād varṣād brāhmaṇasyāpatitā sāvitrī dvāviṃśāt kṣatriyasya caturviṃśād vaiśyasya /
GV06vargs_u:198: nainān yājayeyur nādhyāpayeyur na vivaheyur na vivāhayeyuḥ // VGrs_5.3
GV06vargs_u:201: kumāraṃ paryuptinaṃ snātam abhyaktaśirasam upasparśanakalpe nopaspṛṣṭam agnerdakṣiṇato 'vasthāpya dadhikrāvṇo akāriṣam iti dadhnaḥ kumāraṃ triḥ prāśayet // VGrs_5.6
GV06vargs_u:202: iyaṃ duruktāt paribādhamānā varṇaṃ pavitraṃ punatī na āgāt /
GV06vargs_u:203: prāṇāpānābhyāṃ balam ābhajantī śivā devī subhagā mekhaleyam /
GV06vargs_u:204: ṛtasya goptrī tapasas tarutrī ghnatī rakṣaḥ sahamānā arātīḥ /
GV06vargs_u:205: sā mā samantam anuparyehi bhadre dhartāras te subhage mekhale mā riṣāma /
GV06vargs_u:206: iti mauñjīṃ triguṇāṃ triḥ parivītāṃ mekhalām ābadhnīte /
GV06vargs_u:207: maurvīṃ dhanurjyāṃ kṣatriyasya śāṇīṃ vaiśyasya // VGrs_5.7
GV06vargs_u:208: upavītam asi yajñasya tvopavītenopavyayāmīti yajñopavītam // VGrs_5.8
GV06vargs_u:209: yā akṛtan yā atanvan yā avāyan yā avāharan /
GV06vargs_u:210: yāś cāgnā devīr antān abhito 'tanvata tāstvā devīr jarase saṃvyayantām /
GV06vargs_u:211: āyuṣmān ayaṃ paridhatta vāsaḥ paridhatta varcaḥ /
GV06vargs_u:213: śataṃ ca jīva śaradaḥ purūcīr vasūni cāyyo vibhajāya jīyān /
GV06vargs_u:214: ity ahataṃ vāsa ācchādya mitrasya cakṣurdharaṇaṃ balīyastejo yaśasvi sthaviraṃ ca dhṛṣṇu /
GV06vargs_u:215: anāhanasyaṃ vasanaṃ cariṣṇu parīdaṃ vājyaṃ vājinaṃ dadhe 'ham /
GV06vargs_u:217: ājyaṃ saṃskṛtya brahmāṇam āmantrya samidham ādhāyāghārāv āghāryājyabhāgau hutvāṣṭau jaṭākaraṇīyān juhuyāt // VGrs_5.10
GV06vargs_u:220: kālāya vāṃ gotrāya vāṃ jaitrāya vām audbhetrāya vām annādyāya vām avanenijed ity
GV06vargs_u:221: udakenāñjaliṃ pūrayitvā sukṛtāya vāmiti pāṇī prakṣālya idamahaṃ duryamanyā niṣplāvayāmīty
GV06vargs_u:223: bhrātṛvyāṇāṃ sapatnānām ahaṃ bhūyāsam uttama iti dvitīyam // VGrs_5.14
GV06vargs_u:224: prātar jitaṃ bhagamugraṃ huvema vayaṃ putram aditeryo vidhartā /
GV06vargs_u:225: ādhraś cidyaṃ mantamānasturaś cidrājā cidyaṃ bhagaṃ bhakṣīmahīty āha /
GV06vargs_u:227: brahmacaryam upāgāmupa mā hvayasveti brūyāt // VGrs_5.16
GV06vargs_u:228: ehi brahmopehi brahma brahma tvā sa brahmasantam upanayāmy aham asāv iti // VGrs_5.17
GV06vargs_u:230: devasya te savituḥ prasave 'śvinorbāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyāṃ hastaṃ gṛhṇāmy aham asāv ity asya hastaṃ dakṣiṇena dakṣiṇam uttānam abhīvāṅguṣṭham abhīva lomāni gṛhṇīyāt // VGrs_5.19
GV06vargs_u:231: mām evānvetu te mano māmevāpi tvam anvihi /
GV06vargs_u:232: agnau dhṛtamiva dīpyatāṃ hṛdayaṃ tava yan mayi /
GV06vargs_u:234: pṛṣṭhato 'sya pāṇim anvavahṛtya hṛdayadeśam anvārabhya japet prāṇānāṃ granthir asi sa mā visrasad iti /
GV06vargs_u:236: gaṇānāṃ tvā gaṇapatiṃ havāmahe kaviṃ kavīnām upamaśravastamam /
GV06vargs_u:237: jyeṣṭharājaṃ brahmāṇaṃ brahmaṇaspata ā naḥ kṛṇvann ūtibhiḥ sīda sādanam /
GV06vargs_u:240: adhīhi bho ity upaviśya japati // VGrs_5.24
GV06vargs_u:241: prabhujya dakṣiṇaṃ jānuṃ pāṇī saṃdhāya darbhahastāv oṃ ity uktvā vyāhṛtīḥ sāvitrīṃ cānubrūyāt /
GV06vargs_u:244: ā devo yātu savitā suratna iti triṣṭubhaṃ kṣatriyāya /
GV06vargs_u:247: pālāśaṃ daṇḍaṃ brāhmaṇāya prayacchati naiyagrodhaṃ kṣatriyāyāśvatthaṃ vaiśyāya /
GV06vargs_u:249: yathā tvaṃ suśravaḥ suśravā asy evam ahaṃ suśravaḥ suśravā bhūyāsam /
GV06vargs_u:250: yathā tvaṃ devānāṃ vedasya nidhigopo 'syevamahaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ brahmaṇo nidhigopo bhūyāsamiti pratigṛhṇāti // VGrs_5.27
GV06vargs_u:251: ūrdhvakapālo brāhmaṇasya kamaṇḍaluḥ parimaṇḍalaḥ kṣatriyasya nicalkalo vaiśyasya /
GV06vargs_u:254: iti pratigṛhṇāmīti pratigṛhya bhaikṣyacaryaṃ caret bhavati bhikṣāṃ dehīti brāhmaṇaḥ bhavati madhyāṃ kṣatriyaḥ bhavaty antyāṃ vaiśyaḥ /
GV06vargs_u:260: sāvitrīṃ trir adhītya adhvanām adhvapate svastyasyādhvanaḥ pāramaśīya /
GV06vargs_u:261: yā medhā apsaraḥsu gandharveṣu ca yanmanaḥ /
GV06vargs_u:262: yā medhā daivī mānuṣī sā mām āviśatām iha /
GV06vargs_u:269: taṃ mā saṃsṛja varcaseti mukhaṃ parimṛjīta // VGrs_5.33
GV06vargs_u:273: sa me śraddhāṃ ca medhāṃ ca jātavedāḥ prayacchatu /
GV06vargs_u:276: tejasā mā samaṅgdhi varcasā mā samaṅgdhi brahmavarcasena mā samaṅgdhīti mukhaṃ parimṛjīta // VGrs_5.35
GV06vargs_u:277: āyurdhā agne 'sīti yathārūpaṃ gātrāṇi saṃmṛśati // VGrs_5.36
GV06vargs_u:278: iha dhṛtiriti paryāyair aṃsaṃ grīvāścārcirālabhya rucaṃ no dhehīti lalāṭam abhimṛśet // VGrs_5.37
GV06vargs_u:280: gurave brahmaṇe ca varam uttarāsaṅgaṃ ca dadāti // VGrs_5.39
GV06vargs_u:283: vyuṣṭe dvādaśarātre ṣaḍrātre vā grāmāt prācīṃ vodīcīṃ vā diśam upaniṣkramya paścāt
GV06vargs_u:284: palāśasya yajñīyasya vā vṛkṣasya sāvitreṇa sthālīpākeneṣṭvā jayaprabhṛtibhiścājyasya
GV06vargs_u:285: purastāt sviṣṭakṛto mekhalāṃ daṇḍaṃ cāpsu prāsyet // VGrs_5.42
GV06vargs_u:290: mārgavāsāḥ saṃhatakeśaḥ bhaikṣācaryavṛttiḥ saśalkadaṇḍaḥ saptamauñjīṃ mekhalāṃ dhārayed ācāryasyāpratikūlaḥ sarvakārī // VGrs_6.3
GV06vargs_u:305: adhaḥśāyī ācāryādhīnavṛttiḥ tannisargād aśanam ayācitaṃ lavaṇam // VGrs_6.17
GV06vargs_u:308: acchannavastrāṃ vivṛtāṃ striyaṃ na paśyet // VGrs_6.20
GV06vargs_u:316: raktaṃ vasanakambalam aiṇeyaṃ brāhmaṇasya rauravaṃ kṣatriyasya ājaṃ vaiśyasya // VGrs_6.28
GV06vargs_u:317: etena dharmeṇa dvādaśavarṣāṇy ekavede brahmacaryaṃ caret /
GV06vargs_u:318: caturviṃśati dvayoḥ ṣaṭtriṃśati trayāṇām aṣṭācatvāriṃśati sarveṣām /
GV06vargs_u:320: malajñurabalaḥ kṛśaḥ snātvā sa sarvaṃ labhate yat kiṃcin manasepsitamiti // VGrs_6.30
GV06vargs_u:322: mantrabrāhmaṇānyadhītya kalpaṃ mīmāṃsāṃ ca yājñiko 'dhītya vaktraṃ padaṃ smṛtiṃ caicchikaḥ // VGrs_6.32
GV06vargs_u:327: antarjānu bāhū kṛtvā trir ācāmet // VGrs_6.35
GV06vargs_u:332: āghārāv āghāryājyabhāgau hutvā caturhot n svakarmaṇo juhuyāt /
GV06vargs_u:333: saha pañcahotrā ṣaḍḍhotrā ca saptahotāram antataḥ // VGrs_7.2
GV06vargs_u:334: hutvā vrataṃ pradāyādito dvāv anuvākāv anuvācayet // VGrs_7.3
GV06vargs_u:335: athāgnivratāśvamedhikī dīkṣā saṃvatsaraṃ dvādaśarātraṃ vā // VGrs_7.4
GV06vargs_u:336: ākūtamagnimiti ṣaḍḍhutvā vrataṃ pradāyādito 'ṣṭāv anuvākān anuvācayet // VGrs_7.5
GV06vargs_u:337: triṣavaṇam udakam āharet trīṃs trīn kumbhān // VGrs_7.6
GV06vargs_u:339: bhasmani śayīta karīṣe sikatāsu bhūmau vā // VGrs_7.8
GV06vargs_u:341: saṃvatsare samāpte ghṛtavatāpūpenāgnim iṣṭvā vātsapraṃ vācayet // VGrs_7.10
GV06vargs_u:342: smārtena yāvad adhyayanaṃ kāṇḍavrataviśeṣā homārthaś cādyantayor juhuyāt // VGrs_7.11
GV06vargs_u:353: tiṣṭhed ahani rātrāv āsīta vāgyataḥ // VGrs_7.19
GV06vargs_u:363: aham iddhi pituḥ pari medhā amṛtasya jagrabha /
GV06vargs_u:366: apvo nāmāsi tasya te joṣṭraṃ gameyam /
GV06vargs_u:367: aham iddhi pituḥ pari medhā amṛtasya jagrabha /
GV06vargs_u:377: tasyāste tasya te ity anuṣajet // VGrs_8.3
GV06vargs_u:382: udyujyamānāya svāheti jayaprabhṛtibhiś cājyasya purastāt sviṣṭakṛto 'ntevāsināṃ yogam
GV06vargs_u:383: icchann atha japati ṛtaṃ vadiṣyāmi satyaṃ vadiṣyāmi brahma vadiṣyāmi tan mām avatu
GV06vargs_u:385: vāṅ me manasi pratiṣṭhitā mano me vāci pratiṣṭhitam āvir āyur mayi dhehi /
GV06vargs_u:388: oṃ bhūr bhuvaḥ svariti darbhapāṇis triḥ sāvitrīm adhītyāditaś ca trīn anuvākāṃs tathāṅgānām ekaikam /
GV06vargs_u:391: sataḥ valīkakṣāraprabhṛti varṣaṃ na vidyotamāne na stanayatīti śrutiḥ ākālikaṃ devatu mūlaṃ vidyuddhanvolkātyakṣarāḥ śabdāḥ ācāreṇānye // VGrs_8.6
GV06vargs_u:392: ardhapañcamān māsān adhītya pañcārdhaṣaṣṭhān vā dīkṣaṇāyanaṃ vādhītyāthotsṛjanty
GV06vargs_u:393: etena dharmeṇa ṛtam avādiṣaṃ satyam avādiṣaṃ brahmāvādiṣaṃ tan mām āvīt tadvaktāram
GV06vargs_u:395: vāṅ me manasi pratiṣṭhitā mano me vāci pratiṣṭhitam āvir āyur mayi dhehi /
GV06vargs_u:398: oṃ bhūr bhuvaḥ svar ity antam adhītya ko vo vimuñcatīti ca // VGrs_8.8
GV06vargs_u:404: brahmacārī sucaritī medhāvī karmakṛd dhanadaḥ priyaḥ vidyayā vā vidyām anvicchan // VGrs_8.12
GV06vargs_u:412: yat kṣureṇa parcayatā supeśasā vaptar vapasi keśaśmaśrūn /
GV06vargs_u:418: chandasy arthān buddhvā snāsyan gāṃ kārayet // VGrs_9.7
GV06vargs_u:420: āpo hi ṣṭheti tisṛbhiḥ hiraṇyavarṇāḥ śucaya iti catasṛbhiḥ snātvāhate vāsasī paridadhīta
GV06vargs_u:421: vasvasi vasumantaṃ māṃ kuru sauvarcasāya vāṃ tejase brahmavarcasāya paridadhānīti // VGrs_9.9
GV06vargs_u:423: mālāmābadhnīte yām aśvinau dhārayetāṃ bṛhatīṃ puṣkarasrajam /
GV06vargs_u:427: pratiṣṭhe stho devate mā mā saṃtāptam ityupānahau // VGrs_9.13
GV06vargs_u:433: āmantrya gurūn gurvadhīnāṃśca svān gṛhānvrajet // VGrs_9.18
GV06vargs_u:434: pratiṣiddham aparayā dvārā niḥsaraṇaṃ malavadvāsasā saha sambhāṣā rajasvadvāsasā saha śayyā gor guror duruktavacanam asthāne śayanaṃ sthānaṃ smayanaṃ yānaṃ gānaṃ smaraṇamiti /
GV06vargs_u:441: vinītakrodhaḥ saharṣaḥ saharṣīṃ bhāryāṃ vindetānanyapūrvāṃ yavīyasīm // VGrs_10.1
GV06vargs_u:443: ūrdhvaṃ saptamāt pitṛbandhubhyaḥ pañcamān mātṛbandhubhyo bījinaśca // VGrs_10.2
GV06vargs_u:446: pañca vivāhakārakāṇi bhavanti vittaṃ rūpaṃ vidyā prajñā bāndhavamiti // VGrs_10.5
GV06vargs_u:450: prajñāyāṃ tu bāndhave ca vivadante // VGrs_10.6
GV06vargs_u:451: anṛkṣarā ṛjavaḥ santu panthā yebhiḥ sakhāyo yantu no vareyam /
GV06vargs_u:452: samaryamā saṃ bhago no 'nunīyāt saṃ jāspatyaṃ suyamamastu devāḥ /
GV06vargs_u:454: bandhumatīṃ kanyām aspṛṣṭamaithunām upayacchetānagnikāṃ śreṣṭhām // VGrs_10.8
GV06vargs_u:456: caturo loṣṭān āharet sītāloṣṭaṃ vediloṣṭaṃ gomayaloṣṭaṃ śmaśānaloṣṭaṃ ca // VGrs_10.9
GV06vargs_u:459: asaṃspṛṣṭāṃ dharmeṇopayaccheta brāhmeṇa śaulkena vā // VGrs_10.11
GV06vargs_u:461: ubhayāṃs tejanīṣv āsej janyān kaumārikāṃś ca /
GV06vargs_u:462: pūrve janyāḥ syur apare kaumārikāḥ // VGrs_10.13
GV06vargs_u:463: caturo gomayapiṇḍān kṛtvā dvāv anyebhyas tathānyebhya iti prayacchet // VGrs_10.14
GV06vargs_u:471: ṣaḍarghyārhā bhavanti ṛtvigācāryo vivāhyo rājā snātakaḥ priyaśceti // VGrs_11.1
GV06vargs_u:473: anyatra yājyāt karmaṇo vivāhāc ca // VGrs_11.2
GV06vargs_u:476: kāṃsye camase vā dadhani madhvāsicya varṣīyasāpidhāya virājo doho 'si virājo doho
GV06vargs_u:477: 'si virājo doham aśīya mayi dohaḥ padyāyai virāja iti madhuparkarmāhiyamāṇaṃ pratīkṣate // VGrs_11.5
GV06vargs_u:478: sāvitreṇa viṣṭarau pratigṛhya rāṣṭrabhṛd asīty āsaṃdyām udagagram āstṛṇāti // VGrs_11.6
GV06vargs_u:479: ahaṃ varṣma sadṛśānām udyatānām iva sūryaḥ /
GV06vargs_u:480: idam ahaṃ tam adharaṃ karomi yo mā kaścābhidāsati /
GV06vargs_u:482: mā tvadyoṣam ity anyataram adhastāt pādayor upakarṣati // VGrs_11.8
GV06vargs_u:491: sāvitreṇobhayato viṣṭaraṃ madhuparkaṃ pratigṛhya adityās tvā pṛṣṭhe sādayāmīti bhūmau
GV06vargs_u:492: pratiṣṭhāpyāvasāyya suparṇasya tvā garutmataś cakṣuṣāvekṣa ityavekṣya namo rudrāya
GV06vargs_u:493: pātrasada iti prādeśena pratidiśaṃ vyuddiśyāṅguṣṭhenopamadhyamayā ca madhu vātā ṛtāyata
GV06vargs_u:495: satyaṃ yaśaḥ śrīḥ śrayatāmiti triḥ prāśnāti bhūyiṣṭham // VGrs_11.17
GV06vargs_u:499: hato me pāpmā pāpmānaṃ me hata /
GV06vargs_u:500: yāṃ tvā devā vasavo 'nvajīviṣur ādityānāṃ svasāraṃ rudramātaram /
GV06vargs_u:501: daivīṃ gāmaditiṃ janānām ārabhantām arhatām arhaṇāya /
GV06vargs_u:503: catur avarān brāhmaṇān nānāgotrān ityekaikaṃ paśvaṅgaṃ pāyasaṃ vā bhojayet // VGrs_11.22
GV06vargs_u:504: yadyutsṛjet mātā rudrāṇāṃ duhitā vasūnāṃ svasādityānām amṛtasya nābhiḥ /
GV06vargs_u:505: pra nu vocaṃ cikituṣe janāya mā gāmanāgāmaditiṃ vadhiṣṭa // VGrs_11.23
GV06vargs_u:506: om utsṛjata tṛṇānyat tūdakaṃ pibatu // VGrs_11.24
GV06vargs_u:508: śaṃ no mitra iti pāṇī prakṣālya yathārtham // VGrs_11.26
GV06vargs_u:510: athālaṃkaraṇam alaṃkaraṇam asi sarvasmā alaṃ bhūyāsam // VGrs_12.1
GV06vargs_u:511: prāṇāpānau me tarpayāmi samānavyānau me tarpayāmy udānarūpe me tarpayāmi cakṣuḥśrotre
GV06vargs_u:512: me tarpayāmi sucakṣā aham akṣibhyāṃ bhūyāsaṃ suvarcā mukhena suśrutkarṇābhyām iti
GV06vargs_u:514: paridhāsye yaśo dhāsye dīrghāyutvāya jaradaṣṭir asmi /
GV06vargs_u:515: śataṃ ca jīva śaradaḥ purūcīrvasūni cāyyo vibhajāya jīyām /
GV06vargs_u:516: ityahataṃ vāsa ācchādyāgniṃ prajvālya vyāhṛtibhir vrīhiyavān hutvā maṅgalāny āśāset // VGrs_12.3
GV06vargs_u:518: atha pravadane kanyāmupavasitāṃ snātāṃ saśiraskām ahatenācchinnadaśena vāsasā saṃvītāṃ
GV06vargs_u:519: saṃstīrṇasya purastād vihitāni vāditrāṇi vidhivadupakalpya purastāt sviṣṭakṛto vāce
GV06vargs_u:520: pathyāyai pūṣṇe pṛthivyā agnaye senāyai dhenāyai gāyatryai triṣṭubhe jagatyā anuṣṭubhe
GV06vargs_u:521: paṅktaye virāje rākāyai sinīvālyai kuhvai tvaṣṭra āśāyai sampattyai bhūtyai nirṛtyā
GV06vargs_u:522: anumatyai parjanyāyāgnaye sviṣṭakṛte ca juhuyāt // VGrs_13.1
GV06vargs_u:523: ājyaśeṣeṇa pāṇī pralipya kanyāyā mukhaṃ saṃmārṣṭi priyāṃ karomi pataye devarāṇāṃ śvaśurāya ca /
GV06vargs_u:524: rucyai tvāgniḥ saṃsṛjatu ruciṣyā pataye bhava /
GV06vargs_u:525: saubhāgyena tvā saṃsṛjatv ilā devī ghṛtapadīndrāṇy agnāyyaśvinī rāṭ /
GV06vargs_u:528: sarvāṇi vāditrāṇy abhimantrayate yā caturdhā pravadaty agnau yā vāte yā bṛhatyuta /
GV06vargs_u:529: paśūnāṃ yāṃ brāhmaṇe nyadadhuḥ śivā sā pravadatv iha /
GV06vargs_u:531: sarvāṇi vāditrāṇy alaṃkṛtya kanyā pravādayate śubhaṃ vada dundubhe suprajāstvāya gomukha /
GV06vargs_u:532: prakrīḍantu kanyāḥ sumanasyamānāḥ sahendrāṇyā savayasaḥ sanīḍāḥ /
GV06vargs_u:533: prajāpatiryo vasati prajāsu prajās tanvate sumanasyamānāḥ /
GV06vargs_u:534: sa imāḥ prajā ramayatu prajātyai svayaṃ ca no ramatāṃ śaṃ dadhānaḥ /
GV06vargs_u:539: khe rathasya khe 'nasaḥ khe yugasya śatakratoḥ /
GV06vargs_u:542: athaināṃ darbhaśulvena saṃnahyati saṃ tvā nahyāmi payasā pṛthivyāḥ saṃ tvā nahyāmy adbhiroṣadhībhiḥ /
GV06vargs_u:543: saṃ tvā nahyāmi prajayā dhanena saha saṃnaddhā sunuhi bhāgadheyam /
GV06vargs_u:545: athaināṃ vāsaso 'ntaṃ grāhayitvābhyudānayati aghoracakṣur apatighny edhi /
GV06vargs_u:547: dīrghāyupatnī prajayā svarvid indrapraṇayīr upa no vastum ehi /
GV06vargs_u:549: samūhanollepanoddhananāvekṣaṇam ity agnikāle bhūmisaṃskārān sarvatra yathānimittam // VGrs_14.4
GV06vargs_u:550: paścādagneḥ kaṭe tejanyāṃ vā darbheṣv āsanam // VGrs_14.5
GV06vargs_u:551: śucau bhūmipradeśe śamīśamakaśyāmākānāṃ priyaṅgudūrvāgaurasarṣapāṇāṃ yathālābhagandhasakṣīraphalavadbhyo vanaspatibhyo haritparṇakuśayavādibhiś cānnair yā oṣadhayaḥ /
GV06vargs_u:552: samanyā yantīty anuvākena śaṃ no devīriti ca sahiraṇyāpo 'bhimantrya praṇītodakumbhaṃ praṇayet // VGrs_14.6
GV06vargs_u:553: taṃ lājāhutīṣu hūyamānāsu bhrātā brahmacārī vodgṛhya dhārayed dakṣiṇataśca // VGrs_14.7
GV06vargs_u:554: lājān saṃskṛtān śamīparṇamiśrān śūrpeṇa dakṣiṇato mātānyā vāvidhavā // VGrs_14.8
GV06vargs_u:555: ājyaṃ saṃskṛtya brahmāṇam āmantrya samidham ādhāyāghārāv āghāryājyabhāgau hutvā // VGrs_14.9
GV06vargs_u:560: somaḥ prathamo vivide gandharvo vivida uttaraḥ /
GV06vargs_u:564: rayiṃ ca putrāṃś cādād agnir mahyamatho imām /
GV06vargs_u:566: hiraṇyagarbha ityaṣṭābhiḥ pratyṛcam ājyāhutīr juhuyāt // VGrs_14.11
GV06vargs_u:567: yena karmaṇertset tatra jayāñ juhuyāditi jayānāṃ śrutiḥ /
GV06vargs_u:579: uttarato 'gner darbheṣu prācīṃ kanyām avasthāpya purastāt pratyaṅmukha upayantā devasya
GV06vargs_u:580: te savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyāṃ hastaṃ gṛhṇāmy aham asāv ity
GV06vargs_u:582: gṛhṇāmi te saubhagatvāya hastaṃ mayā patyā jaradaṣṭir yathāsat /
GV06vargs_u:583: bhago 'ryamā savitā puraṃdhir mahyaṃ tvādurgāharpatyāya devāḥ /
GV06vargs_u:585: yāṃ tvā viśvasya bhūtasya prāg āyāmy asyā agrataḥ /
GV06vargs_u:587: yena bhūtaṃ samabhavad yena viśvamidaṃ jagat tāmadya gāthāṃ gāsyāmo yā strīṇām uttamaṃ manaḥ /
GV06vargs_u:588: sā tvam asy amo 'ham amo 'hamasmi sā tvam /
GV06vargs_u:589: dyaur ahaṃ pṛthivī tvaṃ bṛhad ahaṃ rathaṃtaraṃ tvam /
GV06vargs_u:592: sā mām anuvratā bhava sā mām anuprajāyasva /
GV06vargs_u:593: prajāṃ sṛjāvahā ubhau puṃse putrāya kartave /
GV06vargs_u:597: paścād agner darbheṣvaśmānamavasthāpayati ātiṣṭhemam aśmānamaśmeva tvaṃ sthirā bhava /
GV06vargs_u:598: kṛṇvantu viśve devā āyuṣṭe śaradaḥ śatam /
GV06vargs_u:601: uparyagnāv añjalau lājān bhrātā brahmacārī vopastīrṇa āvapet // VGrs_14.17
GV06vargs_u:605: dīrghāyurastu me patir edhantāṃ jñātayo mama /
GV06vargs_u:610: vīrasūr jīvapatnīr bhūyāsam iti sarvatra vācayet // VGrs_14.19
GV06vargs_u:612: punaḥ patibhyo jāyāṃ dā agne prajayā saha /
GV06vargs_u:619: kāmena caturthī pūrayitvā dvir abhighāryottarārdhapūrvārdhe juhuyāt // VGrs_14.22
GV06vargs_u:620: athaināṃ prācīṃ sapta padāni prakramayati ekam iṣe viṣṇustvāṃ nayatu /
GV06vargs_u:628: sakhī saptapadī bhava sakhyaṃ te gameyaṃ sakhyātte mā riṣam iti saptama enāṃ prekṣamāṇāṃ samīkṣate // VGrs_14.23
GV06vargs_u:629: pra tvā muñcātu varuṇasya pāśād yena tvābadhnāt savitā suśevaḥ /
GV06vargs_u:630: dhātuśca yonau sukṛtasya loke hṛṣṭā saṃ saha patyā bhūyāsam /
GV06vargs_u:631: iti śulvaṃ visraṃsyodakumbhena mārjayante punantu mā pitara ityanuvākena /
GV06vargs_u:633: sumaṅgalīr iyaṃ vadhur imāṃ sametya paśyata /
GV06vargs_u:638: yena dyaur ugrety evaṃprabhṛtaya udvāhe homāḥ syuḥ /
GV06vargs_u:642: aṅkau nyaṅkāv abhito rathaṃ ye dhvāntā vātā agram abhi ye saṃpatanti /
GV06vargs_u:643: dūrehetiḥ patatrī vājinīvāṃs te no 'gnayaḥ paprayaḥ pārayantu /
GV06vargs_u:645: sukiṃśukaṃ śalmaliṃ viśvarūpaṃ hiraṇyavarṇaṃ sudhuraṃ sucakram /
GV06vargs_u:646: āroha sūrye amṛtasya panthāṃs tena yāhi gṛhān svasti /
GV06vargs_u:648: upa māyantu devatā upa brahma suvīryam /
GV06vargs_u:649: upa kṣatraṃ ca yadbalamupa māmaitu yadbalam /
GV06vargs_u:651: anu māyantu devatā anu brahma suvīryam /
GV06vargs_u:652: anu kṣatraṃ ca yad yaśamanu māmaitu yadyaśam /
GV06vargs_u:653: iti prāñcaṃ prayāpya pradakṣiṇamāvṛtya yathārthalakṣaṇyavṛkṣaṃ caityaṃ vopatiṣṭheta // VGrs_15.4
GV06vargs_u:655: ye vṛkṣeṣu śaṣpiñjarā iti ca // VGrs_15.5
GV06vargs_u:657: ye pathāṃ pathirakṣaya iti ca // VGrs_15.6
GV06vargs_u:659: ye bhūtānām adhipataya iti ca // VGrs_15.7
GV06vargs_u:663: yatrāpas taritavyā āsīd ati samudrāya vayunāya sindhūnāṃ pataye namaḥ /
GV06vargs_u:667: yāvatāṃ sakhāyānaṃ svastimicchet tāvata udakāñjalīr juhuyāt amṛtam āsye juhomyāyuḥ prāṇe pratidadhāmi amṛtaṃ brahmaṇā saha mṛtyuṃ tarema /
GV06vargs_u:668: prāsahād itīṣṭir asyaditir eva mṛtyuṃdhayamiti trir ācāmet // VGrs_15.11
GV06vargs_u:670: yadyakṣā śamyāṇir vā riṣyeta tatraivāgnim upasamādhāyāgneyena sthālīpākeneṣṭvā jayaprabhṛtibhiś cājyasya pustāt sviṣṭakṛtaḥ // VGrs_15.13
GV06vargs_u:675: irāṃ vahantī ghṛtam ukṣamāṇāṃs teṣv ahaṃ sumanāḥ saṃviśāmi /
GV06vargs_u:679: athāsyā brahmacāriṇaṃ jīvapitṛkaṃ jīvamātṛkam utsaṅgamupaveśayet // VGrs_15.19
GV06vargs_u:681: acyutā dhruvā dhruvapatnī dhruvaṃ paśyema viśvata iti dhruvaṃ jīvantīṃ saptarṣīn
GV06vargs_u:682: arundhatīmiti darśayitvā prājāpatyena sthālīpākeneṣṭvā jayaprabhṛtibhiś cājyasya
GV06vargs_u:683: purastāt sviṣṭakṛta ājyaśeṣe dadhyāsicya dadhikrāvṇo akāriṣam iti dadhnaḥ pumāṃstriḥ
GV06vargs_u:685: cakram ivānaḍuhaḥ padaṃ māmevānvetu te manaḥ /
GV06vargs_u:686: māṃ ca paśyasi sūryaṃ ca mā cānyeṣu manaskṛthāḥ /
GV06vargs_u:687: cākravākaṃ saṃvasanaṃ tan nau saṃvananaṃ kṛtam /
GV06vargs_u:692: evameva caturthyāṃ kṛtvā hiraṇyagarbha ityaṣṭābhiḥ sthālīpākasya hutvā jayaprabhṛtibhiścājyasya purastātsviṣṭakṛtaḥ // VGrs_15.25
GV06vargs_u:693: athāsyāḥ savye 'ṃse pūṣā te granthiṃ grathnātv iti vāsaso granthiṃ kriyamāṇam anumantrayate // VGrs_15.26
GV06vargs_u:700: apaśyaṃ tvā manasā cekitānaṃ tapaso jātaṃ tapaso 'bhibhūtam /
GV06vargs_u:701: iha prajāmiha rayiṃ rarāṇaḥ prajāyasva prajayā putrakāma /
GV06vargs_u:702: apaśyaṃ tvā manasā dīdhyānāṃ svāyāṃ tanūm ṛtviye nādhamānām /
GV06vargs_u:703: upa mām uccā yuvatir babhūyāt prajāyasva prajayā putrakāme /
GV06vargs_u:704: prajāpate tanvaṃ me juṣasva tvaṣṭā vīraiḥ sahasāham indraḥ /
GV06vargs_u:705: indreṇa devairvīrudhaḥ saṃvyayantāṃ bahūnāṃ puṃsāṃ pitarau syāva /
GV06vargs_u:706: ahaṃ prajā ajanayaṃ pṛthivyām ahaṃ garbham adadhāmoṣadhīṣu /
GV06vargs_u:707: ahaṃ viśveṣu bhuvaneṣvantar ahaṃ prajābhyo bibharṣi putrān /
GV06vargs_u:712: athāsyāstṛtīye garbhamāse puṃsā nakṣatreṇa yad ahaścandramā na dṛśyeta tadahar vopoṣyāplāvyāhataṃ
GV06vargs_u:713: vāsa ācchādya nyagrodhāvarohaśuṅgānyudapeṣaṃ piṣṭvā dakṣiṇāsminnāsikāchidra āsiñcet hiraṇyagarbhaḥ /
GV06vargs_u:715: athāsyā dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣim abhimṛśet pumān agniḥ pumānindraḥ pumāndevo bṛhaspatiḥ /
GV06vargs_u:718: pumāṃsaṃ garbhaṃ jāyasva tvaṃ pumān anujāyatām /
GV06vargs_u:720: athāsyāḥ pañcame ṣaṣṭhe saptame vā garbhamāse maṅgalyaiḥ snāpayitvā prājāpatyena sthālīpākeneṣṭvā jayaprabhṛtibhiścājyasya purastātsviṣṭakṛtaḥ
GV06vargs_u:721: paścādagnerdarbheṣv āsīnāyāḥ sarvān keśān vipramucya tvamaryamā bhavasi yatkanīnāṃ devaḥ svadhāvo guhyaṃ bibharṣi /
GV06vargs_u:722: añjanti vipraṃ sukṛtaṃ na gobhir yad dampatī sumanasā kṛṇoṣi /
GV06vargs_u:723: iti navanītena pāṇī pralipya sarvān keśān saṃprayauti // VGrs_16.7
GV06vargs_u:724: indrāṇī cakre kaṅkataṃ sa sīmantaṃ visarpatu iti kaṅkataṃ gṛhṇāti // VGrs_16.8
GV06vargs_u:728: dīrghāyur asyā yaḥ patir jīvātu śaradaḥ śatam /
GV06vargs_u:730: athāsyāḥ patir dvedhā keśān badhnāti nīlalohitena sūtreṇa jīvorṇayā vā // VGrs_16.11
GV06vargs_u:733: tatra sāyaṃprātaḥprabhṛtīnām agnihotravat parisamuhya paristīrya paryukṣya sāyaṃ prātaḥ syādityeke // VGrs_17.2
GV06vargs_u:735: agnaye somāya prajāpataye dhanvantaraye vāstoṣpataye viśvebhyo devebhyo 'gnaye sviṣṭakṛte ca juhuyāt // VGrs_17.4
GV06vargs_u:737: dadhimadhumiśrasyāgnaye purastāt yamāya dakṣiṇataḥ somāya paścāt varuṇāyottarataḥ madhye varuṇāryamabhyāṃ brahmaṇe ca /
GV06vargs_u:738: agnaye pṛthivyai vāyave 'ntarikṣāya sūryāya dive candramase nakṣatrebhya iti // VGrs_17.6
GV06vargs_u:751: ye devā yāni bhūtāni prapadye tāni me svastyayanaṃ kurvantviti /
GV06vargs_u:757: snehavad amāṃsam annaṃ bhojayitvā viduṣo brāhmaṇān arthasiddhiṃ vācayet // VGrs_17.18
GV06vargs_u:758: baliharaṇasyānte yāmāśiṣam icchet tām āśāsīta // VGrs_17.19
GV06vargs_u:759: gṛhapatiḥ oṃ akṣayam annam astv ity āha // VGrs_17.20
GV06vargs_u:760: bhikṣāṃ pradāya sāyaṃ bhojanameva prātar āśet // VGrs_17.21
